languages.text: Инцендия Чорда желает заполучить для суда Владайма Токара. Астероиды Футфола оцеплены ее блюстителями, и единственный способ для Лорд-капитана свободно перемещаться по станции — принять предложение леди Чорда... или сделать вид, что он{mf||а} принял{mf||а} его.

Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.
languages.original_text: Инцендия Чорда желает заполучить для суда Владайма Токара. Астероиды Футфола оцеплены ее блюстителями, и единственный способ для Лорд-капитана свободно перемещаться по станции — принять предложение леди Чорда... или сделать вид, что он{mf||а} принял{mf||а} его.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

languages.text: Incendia Chorda souhaite que Vladaym Tocara soit jugé et a chargé ses prévôts de bloquer l'accès aux astéroïdes de Castel. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} souhaite pouvoir se déplacer librement dans la station, une seule solution s'offre à {mf|lui|elle} : accepter la proposition de dame Chorda... ou du moins, faire semblant.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda souhaite que Vladaym Tocara soit jugé et a chargé ses prévôts de bloquer l'accès aux astéroïdes de Castel. Si {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} souhaite pouvoir se déplacer librement dans la station, une seule solution s'offre à {mf|lui|elle} : accepter la proposition de dame Chorda... ou du moins, faire semblant.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达打算对弗拉迪姆·托卡拉进行审判，落脚港的小行星已经被她的执法者封锁了。若要在落脚港内自由行动，唯一的办法就是接受库尔达女士的提议……或者假装接受她的提议。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达打算对弗拉迪姆·托卡拉进行审判，落脚港的小行星已经被她的执法者封锁了。若要在落脚港内自由行动，唯一的办法就是接受库尔达女士的提议……或者假装接受她的提议。

languages.text: インセンディア・チョーダはヴラダイム・トカラが裁判にかけられることを望んでいる。彼女のエンフォーサーたちがフットフォールの小惑星帯に非常線を張って封鎖しているため、ロード・キャプテンがステーションの自由な運営権を手に入れるための唯一の方法は、レディ・チョーダの提案を受け入れること…もしくは、受け入れるふりをすることである。
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

traits.locale_text: インセンディア・チョーダはヴラダイム・トカラが裁判にかけられることを望んでいる。彼女のエンフォーサーたちがフットフォールの小惑星帯に非常線を張って封鎖しているため、ロード・キャプテンがステーションの自由な運営権を手に入れるための唯一の方法は、レディ・チョーダの提案を受け入れること…もしくは、受け入れるふりをすることである。

languages.text: Incendia Chorda möchte, dass Vladaym Tocara der Prozess gemacht wird. Die Asteroiden von Footfall wurden durch ihre Enforcers abgeriegelt. Wenn der Lord Captain sich auf der Station frei bewegen will, gibt es nur eine Lösung. Er muss Lady Chordas Vorschlag annehmen ... oder das zumindest vorgeben.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda möchte, dass Vladaym Tocara der Prozess gemacht wird. Die Asteroiden von Footfall wurden durch ihre Enforcers abgeriegelt. Wenn der Lord Captain sich auf der Station frei bewegen will, gibt es nur eine Lösung. Er muss Lady Chordas Vorschlag annehmen ... oder das zumindest vorgeben.

languages.text: Incendia Chorda quiere que Vladaym Tocara sea juzgado. Su personal de seguridad tiene bloqueado el acceso a los asteroides de Paso y la única forma de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pueda acceder es aceptar su propuesta... o al menos fingir aceptarla.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.

traits.locale_text: Incendia Chorda quiere que Vladaym Tocara sea juzgado. Su personal de seguridad tiene bloqueado el acceso a los asteroides de Paso y la única forma de que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán pueda acceder es aceptar su propuesta... o al menos fingir aceptarla.

languages.text: İncendia Chorda, Vladaym Tocara'nın yargılanmasını istiyor. İnfazcıları, Binliman'ın asteroitlerini kordona alındı. Lord Kaptan'ın istasyona rahatça girip çıkmasını sağlayacak tek çözüm, Leydi Chorda'nın teklifini kabul etmek veya kabul ediyormuş gibi davranmak olacaktır.
languages.original_text: Incendia Chorda wishes for Vladaym Tocara to stand trial. Footfall's asteroids are cordoned off by her enforcers, and the only solution that would grant the Lord Captain free run of the station is accepting Lady Chorda's proposition... or at least pretending to accept it.
